profile:
Thank you for visiting Envirotech Insulation and Envirotech Electrical Services Inc.   
 
We are a dual service organization, offering a full range of electrical services for commercial and residential, along with specializing in retrofit wall insulation, attic insulation, and garage ceiling insulation applications. We also offer removal of insulation. 
 
Over 28 years licensed in the electrical trade, with experience in residential, commercial, industrial, microfit and net metering solar installations, backup generators, Generlink transfer switches, aluminum wiring.  A member of the ACP program for electrical contractors, we can take care of all your electrical needs.
 
**We were the preferred electrical contractor for HGTV's DECKED OUT during their last season.**
 
Envirotech Insulation specializes in installing cellulose in walls, cavities, knee walls, garage ceilings, attics, and other area that might be inaccessible without having to remove plaster, or drywall.  Through infrared we can identify problem areas of air leakage, and missing or lack of insulation to help suggest the proper recommendations for increasing the energy efficiency and comfort in your home. We also offer dense packed cellulose insulation for soundproofing/noise reduction applications. We ensure intake venting is appropriate from the soffits, and exhaust fan are connected properly.  
www.envirotechinsulation.ca
 
Please contact us for an estimate, and to learn more about the products and services we offer

profile:
Encore Electric Inc.

Who We Are
Located in Barrie ON. Encore Electric Inc. is a family owned operation that brings two main elements to your electrical work. Quality and Customer Service. We take pride in the work we complete and creating satisfied customers in the process. We intend to stand out from the industry average! 

We do all types of electrical installation including 200A Service Upgrades, Type 2 EV Charger and Tesla EV Charger, Knob and Tube Removal, Aluminum Wiring Replacement, Fuse Panel Upgrades, Pot Light Installation, Smart Home Automation, and all aspects of the Electrical Trade!

Contact Chris directly to set up an appointment for a Free Estimate!


You can be confident in hiring Encore Electric Inc. Our philosophy is that if we provide a great service, and the customer is satisfied, they will want to hire us again! 

READ OUR REVIEWS!!
We understand testimonials are a big part in showing how a company operates. We are proud of all our reviews we receive and our clients have been fantastic in leaving such positive reviews. There's no better reference of a company than past customers. We take pride in keeping our customers satisfied, and it shows in our reviews.

ABOUT US
Reliable Electricians
dgr electrical contracting specializes in residential and commercial services. Whether you need a small wiring fix or the installation of state-of-the-art smart home, we get the job done right. 

Flexible Services
We provide a thorough consultation to explain your available options. With that information, you can choose the scope of work that’s right for your home or business and for your budget. 

Satisfaction Guaranteed
We strive to save you both time and money by combining experience, high quality parts and equipment, and exceptional service. We will stick with the job until you are satisfied.

Our mission is to complete your project on time and on budget, with a smile. We love what we do and it really shows in our work. profile:
Electricity makes our life easier, but when it doesn’t work – it can be inconvenient, or downright dangerous. That’s why it’s important to choose an electrician that is experienced and committed to excellence. After all, the safety and security of your home and family should never be compromised.
We are Nu-Tek Electric! We are professional, timely, and local licensed residential electricians which means we specialize in helping homeowners keep their family electrically safe. We have been serving the community for over 30 years. This ensures that we have the skills and experience necessary to tackle any repair or new installation you may have. We believe that training is a constant process that enables us to serve you better so regular training is a major reason that our electricians are among the best in the industry.
So whether you need a generator to keep your power on during a storm, want to replace your outdated electrical panel, planning a home renovation or a lighting project or have a small repair to make your life easier, – we are here for you!
Friendly…Helpful…Professional
That’s the Nu-Tek Service Promise!
Look for us in our big blue vans and give us a wave! We are here to light up your smile!

profile:
ECRA LICENSE# 7015486

At LA Plus Electrical Contracting Inc we are available to assist you with all of your residential, your commercial, your industrial and emergency electrical requirements. Our team of qualified electricians can tackle any job from lighting upgrades to entire home fit-outs. We get the Job Done Right! We are reliable, honest, hardworking, professional electricians who pride ourselves on our excellent reputation and getting your job completed right the first time.

LA Plus Electrical contracting is an approved electrical master contractor company with the Ontario Electrical Safety Authority. Based in GTA. Our licensed electricians operate throughout York Region, Simcoe County, and North Toronto. We work one-on-one with our customers to provide a complete range of electrical services for residential and commercial projects. We also carry out electrical work for builders and contractors working on residential and commercial, additions and remodeling projects.

profile:
Toronto Generators (formerly Paga Technologies) has been installing and servicing standby generators since 2002. When the power goes out, a standby generator comes on automatically, restoring power to your home, business or cottage. We proudly supported our many clients through the December 2013 ice storm, and have expanded in order to continue providing exceptional service to our growing customer base.

We pride ourselves on our exceptional customer service, and our staff have the knowledge, experience and training to answer all of your questions. We would be happy to provide you with a site visit and written quote free of charge, so please call us today! Our specialty is Generator Installation and Service!

https://homestars.com/companies/2887141-toronto-generators

services: Toronto Generators is your authorized Generac installer in the Toronto area. The result will be a safe, reliable installation you can count on when the power goes out. profile:
Dawning Light Electric is an electrical contracting company that does residential, commercial, and industrial projects. We do renovations (both residential and commercial), and we are especially skilled in agricultural electrical work (such as farms, barns, etc.). We serve a wide area in southern Ontario, including Georgina, York, Simcoe, Durham, Halton, and the Greater Toronto Area (GTA).

NICHOLAS SMITH
Nicholas Smith is the owner and director of Dawning Light Electric. He has been in the electrical business since 2007, when he started working as a pre-apprentice. Since then, he has continued to work on a range of electrical projects, including residential, commercial, and industrial. He founded Dawning Light Electric in order to provide reliable, honest electrical contracting services to residents and companies throughout Georgina, York, Simcoe, Durham, Halton, and the Greater Toronto Area (GTA).

Nicholas truly enjoys all of the challenges that come with providing electrical services. He prides himself on staying calm and unflappable, even when faced with a messy and complicated project. He has a reputation among customers for being honest and trustworthy. And while he has experience working on a wide range of residential, commercial, and industrial projects, his farming background makes uniquely suited to providing electrical services for farms.
